name: Adwit Digital
description:
At Adwit Digital, we believe that online marketing is not gobbledygook, and neither is it rocket science. Our approach to online marketing is similar to traditional marketing – driven by a deep understanding of consumer behavior and backed by expertise in crafting effective online marketing communications that evoke response.
We specialize in designing websites – which we believe is a necessary modern equivalent of VM (Visual Merchandising). We are experts in email marketing, and handle one-off mailers as well as end-to-end campaigns. We have also perfected the art of efficient overnight production of creative online static and animated banner ads.
